articles.title: Denmark helped US spy on Merkel, EU officials during Obama administration: reports - Fox News
articles.description: Denmark’s intelligence service worked with its U.S. counterpart to collect information on European leaders including German Chancellor Angela Merkel, according to several reports in Danish media.
